DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify specific patient, physician, and health system related factors associated with the progression to a more intensive regimen from initial insulin therapy for patients with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study to Understand Challenges Associated With Progression of Insulin Therapy in Type 2 Diabetes
